Description: American Tower Corporation, a nationwide telecommunications company with a corporate office in Boston, paid nearly $290,000 in back wages to 167 employees for uncompensated overtime work revealed during a U.S. Department of Labor investigation.
Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division

Agency: South Coast (CA) Air Quality Management District
